snippet: Quarterback Robert Griffin III said he expected to be fully recovered from knee surgery and in uniform when the Washington Redskins open training camp July 25.
abstract: Washington Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III says he expects to be fully recovered fron knee surgery and be in uniform when training camp opens.
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Robert Griffin III said he expected to be fully recovered from knee surgery and in uniform when the Washington Redskins open training camp July 25.

headline.seo: Redskins’ Robert Griffin III Optimistic About Recovery Time
headline.main: Redskins’ Griffin Optimistic About Recovery Time
